channel.title: Overused things in the TOL Lore/Fanfic forums (we are all guilty)
channel.description:
When making a class, there is some overused things ive noticed. These things are:
-OCCUPATION AND REDIRECION IMMUNITY! -Neutral Classes -(not as much but) 1 time death immunity -Neutral Killers. This doesnt really annoy me though because there are fun to make and read -Socials, surpirsingly enough -Unique classes
**This is a work in progress. If you have any other overused things just comment it, ill add it!**

item.title: Overused things in the TOL Lore/Fanfic forums (we are all guilty)
item.dc:creator: justaneut
item.description:
we also see a lot of classes wich are either WAY to strong or are almost the same to some other social deduction game classes

Read full topic

item.description:
When making a class, there is some overused things ive noticed. These things are:

-OCCUPATION AND REDIRECION IMMUNITY!
-Neutral Classes
-(not as much but) 1 time death immunity
-Neutral Killers. This doesnt really annoy me though because there are fun to make and read
-Socials, surpirsingly enough
-Unique classes

This is a work in progress. If you have any other overused things just comment it, ill add it!
